pkgmetadata.longdescription: # PEP 440A simple package with utils to check whether versions number match [Pep440](https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0440/)Example:```>>> from pep440 import is_canonical>>> is_canonical('4.1.0')True>>> is_canonical('4.2.1.beta2') # 4.2.1b2 is correctFalse```For a bigger dependencies with more utilities see [PyPA Packaging (versionsubmodule)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/packaging)
